project.name: Apache Fineract
project.description:
Apache Fineract provides a reliable, robust, and affordable solution for entrepreneurs, financial institutions, and service providers to offer financial services to the worldâ€™s 3 billion underbanked and unbanked. Fineract is aimed at innovative mobile and cloud-based solutions, and enables digital transaction accounts for all.

Fineract is the back-end platform and REST APIs which power the Mifos X mobile and web apps for customers and staff.
